detail_desc: Blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with yoke and decorative gathers front and back, and long, wide sleeves with ties at the cuffs.

3-piece set with a zip-through hoodie and joggers in sweatshirt fabric and a jersey T-shirt. Hoodie with a zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Joggers in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. T-shirt with a print motif.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 68x180 cm.
Soft toy in soft velour with embroidery, a shimmering crown and detachable, glittery butterfly wings. Removable dress in satin with a layer of tulle over the skirt. Size approx. 22 cm.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Concealed buttons down the front, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Pockets in the side seams and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Earrings and ear cuffs in metal decorated with glass rhinestones. Three earrings and three ear cuffs.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and decorative lace trims at the front and hems.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.

Short dress in an airy weave with embroidery in a contrasting colour. Gathered seam around the neckline, a V-shaped opening at the front and pin-tucks around the sleeves and skirt. Long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist with a twisted, tasselled drawstring, and a gathered seam at the hem. Lined skirt.

Knee-length dress in an airy, textured weave made from a viscose blend with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the neckline. Short, wide sleeves and an elasticated seam and tie belt at the waist.
Blouse in woven fabric with a sheen, an opening at the top and embroidery down the front. Narrow trim ending in tassels and long wide sleeves with a narrow trim at the cuffs.
Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a seam below the waist and a flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Chinos in airy, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck at the front with a frill trim that continues over the shoulders. Low-cut back with a frill trim and horizontal ties.
Platform sandals in suede with crossover straps at the front and an adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle at the side. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with side panels. Skinny fit with easy pull-on, soft, covered elastication at the waist. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbed cuffs.
Earrings with sparkly stones and beads. Length 5.5 cm.
Four metal ear cuffs and two ear cuffs with pearly plastic beads.
Calf-length jeans in washed stretch cotton denim with a high waist, small front pockets, back pockets and straight, wide legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a double polo neck and long sleeves.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Blouse in a cotton weave with beaded decorations on the front, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, short sleeves with a seam and narrow, elasticated trim at the top and a seam at the waist with a flared peplum.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, stand up collar and zip down the front. Padded front and back sections and fleece-lined raglan sleeves in sturdy jersey with ribbed panels. Inset jersey panels in the sides and zipped front pockets. Longer and gently rounded at the back. Partly lined.
Short, metal necklace with letter pendants. Adjustable length 37-45 cm..
Shaping Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and half-string back. The briefs have a light shaping effect on the tummy and hips.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a soft faux shearling tongue. Soft faux shearling linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Short, fitted dress in washed, stretch denim with a square neckline front and back. Short sleeves, buttons down the front and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a top and trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Double-breasted coat in a woven wool blend with large notch lapels, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Short, A-line skirt in soft slub jersey. High waist with wide elastication and a small frill trim at the top.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and zip at the back.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey with decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Bralette in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Set with a vest top and shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.

V-neck dress in an airy plumeti weave with a glittery pattern. Seam at the top with gathers, a transparent yoke and long, wide transparent sleeves with ties at the ends. Seam at the waist with ties on both sides and a wide skirt that is longer at the back. Lined.
Fine-knit, shaftless socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Loose-fitting, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waistband in sturdier fabric and a high cut at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck and padded cups with removable inserts. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a mesh racer back and elastication at the hem. Medium support.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in imitation leather with glittery details, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Blouse in a soft cotton weave with a rounded collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a flounce at the front, back and over the shoulders, and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Low-necked vest top in soft, ribbed viscose jersey.
Top in airy viscose jersey with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Nightdress in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, wide shoulder straps and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted vest top in soft jersey.
Sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and a straight hem.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft pima cotton jersey. Fitted V-neck top with a lace trim at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Short shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Set with a top and shorts in cotton. Patterned jersey top. 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim. Relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Calf-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon with a high, elasticated waist. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Trainer socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Short dungaree shorts in washed, stretch denim with a chest pocket and adjustable straps. Buttons at the sides, a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Treggings in stretch narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a glittery all-over print, an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Strapless swimsuit with a small frill trim at the top, padded cups that shape the bust and provide support, and narrow, detachable straps that tie at the back of the neck. Lined.
Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a straight style in a soft knit containing some wool with a foldover, ribbed hem at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wrapover skirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with wide, flounced trims, a button at the waistband and ties at one side. Unlined.

Long jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. 3/4-length sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, and an adjustable tab and button at the sides of the hem.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a smocked bodice and a narrow, elasticated trim around the square neckline. Short puff sleeves with smocking at the hems, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and a seam at the hem with a decorative knot detail at the front.

Boiler suit in airy cotton denim with a resort collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves and cuffs with a concealed press-stud. Chest pocket, patch front pockets and back pockets. Detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, gently tapered legs.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Balaclava in a soft knit with ears on top. Fleece lining.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Wide blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with short sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with long raglan sleeves and buttons down one side. Ribbed trims around the neckline, down the button band, and at the cuffs and hem.
